attributes.action: make all immigrant people who enter the UK take a test on how to speak english
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: most immigrant people who enter the uk cannot speak a word of english and when it comes to serving them in any shop/bar/anywhere UK citizens cannot understand them. When wishing to enter they must be able to speak english and must take a simple test on english language. They must also find a suitable job and not be able to claim any kind of benefit off the state. All companies who decide to hire immigrant people on must not fire people/make people redundant etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
